Just add a single line of code in your app, and you can require a USDC payment for each incoming request.

paymentMiddleware("0xYourAddress", {"/your-endpoint": "$0.01"});
// and thats it!
If a request arrives without payment, the server responds with HTTP 402, prompting the client to pay and retry.

HTTP/1.1 402 Payment Required

# 1. Link your GitHub repo
git remote add github https://github.com/FutureScan/FutureScan-Tech.git

# 2. Stage all your files for commit
git add .

# 3. Commit the files
git commit -m "Initial commit: FutureScan AI crypto intelligence platform"

# 4. Push everything to your GitHub repository
git push github main
